name: Suspicious WMIC ActiveScriptEventConsumer Creation
description: Detects WMIC executions in which a event consumer gets created in order to establish persistence
false_positives: Legitimate software creating script event consumers
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*ActiveScriptEventConsumer* AND process.command_line:*\ CREATE\ *)`
